#nametype [nametype]: 104
The Members of the Third Tier are few and powerful. Kings are but mere puppets in their hands. By poisonous words and domination of the mind, they can send a kingdom into turmoil. This one was accepted into the Third Tier after successfully infiltrating the Magisters of Man. He has since improved his skills in air magic and is expected to mastermind the fall of Man.
